subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa is swinging a baseball bat again, trying to squeeze another season out of his 38-year old body and write a different ending to a career that has been compelling and perplexing.
snippet: Sammy Sosa is swinging a baseball bat again, trying to squeeze another season out of his 38-year old body and write a different ending to a career that has been compelling and perplexing.
